name: dynamodb-ui
description: 100% client side HTML gui for AWS DynamoDB.

scripts.libs: mkdir -p dist/js && concat -o dist/js/libs.js src/libs/async-2.6.0.js src/libs/promise-6.1.0.js src/libs/jquery/jquery.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-1.0.0-build-107.min.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-window.min.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-tooltip.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-scrollarea.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-split.js src/libs/ace/ace-1.2.9.js src/libs/ractive/ractive-ace.js src/libs/ace/mode_sql.js  src/libs/ace/custom.js src/libs/ace/jsoneditor-minimalist.js
scripts.dynamodb-ui: concat -o dist/js/dynamodb-ui.js  src/js/dynamodb/c-minitablelist.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablelistfull.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablecreate.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tabletab.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tableinfo.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablemetrics.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablealarms.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablecapacity.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tableindexes.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tableglobal.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tablebackup.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tabletriggers.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tableitems.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tabledata.js src/js/dynamodb/c-tabs.js src/js/dynamodb/c-dynamodb-ui.js src/js/dynamodb/win-item-create.js src/js/dynamodb/win-item-view.js
scripts.all: npm run libs && npm run dynamodb && npm run dynamodb-ui && npm run mainjs && npm run build-css
